name: Grapploct
description: The Tantrum Pokémon. A body made up of nothing but muscle makes the grappling moves this Pokémon performs with its tentacles tremendously powerful.

abilities.name: Limber
abilities.description: This Pokémon is immune to being paralyzed.

abilities.name: Technician
abilities.description: For damaging moves activated by this Pokémon with 15 max PP or more, they may roll the damage twice and choose either total.
